EmailTemplate.name: Zoom Webinar Invitation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Zoom Webinar Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there,
You are invited to a Zoom webinar. When: Nov 24, 2018 11:03 AM Beijing, Shanghai Topic: Zoom Webinar Test1109
Register in advance for this webinar: https://zoom.us/webinar/register/ff32e9ffdb2d61b3cde7dc3c8da9331e
After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the webinar.
